system.requirements:
Tier 2; Mechanicus Implants
Aptitudes: Intelligence, Tech, Unaligned
system.effect:
Character is trained in the use of a particular kind of Mechadendrite in much the same way Weapon Training allows the use of weapons. Groups: 
Mechedendrite use (Weapon), used for any mechadendrite equippe with a melee or ranged weapon and have the appropriate strength to be used in combat
Mechadendrite Use (Utility), used for more varied mechadendrites, such as Machine Spirit Interfaces, Manipulators, Medicae, Utility, Optical, and so on.
